question: Who among the following was appointed as chairman of a committee established by the Supreme Court to make the Prevention of Damage to Public Property Act, 1984 more effective and also to suggest suitable changes or alterations which can make the statue more meaningful?
explanation: Justice K. T. Thomas was appointed as chairman of a committee established by the Supreme Court to make the Prevention of Damage to Public Property Act, 1984 more effective and also to suggest suitable changes.
